sentences.en: " With the sail that bears me toward Loyang. In Yangzhou trees linger bell - notes of evening , "
sentences.cn: 归 棹 洛阳人,残钟广陵树.

sentences.en: a taste that lingers in your mouth
sentences.cn: 口中的余味

sentences.en: Customers are welcome to linger over coffee until around midnight.
sentences.cn: 客人尽可以喝着咖啡逗留到午夜左右。

sentences.en: Days in summer, Basil , are apt to linger.
sentences.cn: 夏日悠悠, 贝西尔.

sentences.en: Did the ghost of that grand passion linger in some corner of his heart?
sentences.cn: 难道那种崇高感情的残魂还逗留在他心田的某一角 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't linger away your holidays. Try to find something useful to do.
sentences.cn: 不要虚度假日, 尽量找些有意义的事做.

sentences.en: He made excuses to linger on the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他找借口故意在楼梯口上磨磨蹭蹭.

sentences.en: He surprised all the doctors by lingering on for several weeks.
sentences.cn: 他拖了几个星期才去世，让所有的医生都很惊讶。

sentences.en: His last words still linger in our ears.
sentences.cn: 他的临终嘱咐仍萦绕在我们耳际.

sentences.en: How much linger am I staying?
sentences.cn: 我还能呆多久?

sentences.en: I spent a week at Kandersteg and could happily have lingered on.
sentences.cn: 我在坎德施泰格逗留了一个星期，本来还可以开开心心地多待几天。

sentences.en: It is a dreary little town where few would choose to linger.
sentences.cn: 这是个沉闷的小镇，没几个人会愿意在此流连。

sentences.en: Larry didn't linger over his work completely, but he did linger over it to some extent.
sentences.cn: 劳里虽未完全磨洋工, 但多少有一点.

sentences.en: Mother told him not to linger on the way home.
sentences.cn: 妈妈告诉他不要在回家的路上逗留.

sentences.en: Such walls as in time may linger as a mere fable.
sentences.cn: 这类高墙到将来只会给后代当作闲话当年的资料罢了.

sentences.en: Their reflections on the shimmering waves Always linger in the depth of my heart.
sentences.cn: 波光里的艳影,在我的心头荡漾.

sentences.en: Unfortunately the tax will linger on until April.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，这项税收要持续到4月份。

sentences.en: We lingered over breakfast on the terrace.
sentences.cn: 我们在平台上慢条斯理地吃着早餐。

sentences.en: Whereas gasoline fumes linger close to the ground before dispersing.
sentences.cn: 而汽油烟气却靠近地面迟迟不散.

sentences.en: Wherefore should we linger upon it now?
sentences.cn: 现在我们又何必去留恋 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 徘徊；缓慢消失；沉思（linger的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 在…上拖延；细细思考；仔细欣赏；慢吞吞地做某事

trans.tran_en: to stay somewhere a little longer, especially because you do not want to leave
to continue to exist, be noticeable etc for longer than is usual or desirable
